MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG9 area of Stranraer. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have located a grounded overhead electricity line near Kathleen Cottage and due to the extent of the repairs required onsite, we now expect your supply to be restored by 4pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1:35pm on Sunday, 13 December 2020
